author: trustin
msg: Fixed issue: DIRMINA-180 (StreamWriteFilterTest.testWriteUsingSocketTransport fails on OS X)
* Applied Peter's patch: setTrafficClass is called only when a new value is specified to work around the MacOS X issue.

author: aramirez
msg: -The outputDirectory in JavadocJar was changed to jarOutputDirectory.
-The alias was removed for the destDir variable in JavadocJar.

author: sahan
msg: Changed the socket close mechanism to allow slow clients

author: epunzalan
msg: Patch enabled manual configuration of the Idea libraries in addition to the libraries generated by the plugin.  Also, allowed directory exclusions configuration, again, in addition to those that are excluded by the plugin by default (project.build.directory, project.build.outputDirectory, project.build.testOutputDirectory).
